column2: [GetDateText]: [From.GetTitledName] returned home from raiding with a fleet laden with over 1000 gold and was bestowed the Viking Raider achievement.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] was elected to succeed [From.GetTitledName] and was bestowed the Doge Elect achievement.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] was raised to the rank of Empress, a rank her mother and mother's mother had also held, and was bestowed the Empressive achievement.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] has killed three of her husbands, and has been bestowed the achievement Black Widow.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] was killed on the orders of [Root.GetHerHis] liege, [This.GetTitledName], who was bestowed the achievement Turbulent Priest.
[GetDateText]: [This.GetTitledName] had [This.GetHerHis] fifth child, and was bestowed the achievement Full House.
[GetDateText]: [This.GetTitledName] has funded the election of the immoral [Root.GetTitledName], and was bestowed the achievement Black Bishop.
[GetDateText]: [This.GetTitledName] had an inbred child, and was bestowed the achievement Keeping it in the Family.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] married [New.GetTitledName] and was bestowed the achievement §YThe Marriage Game§!.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled the Empire of Britannia while professing faith in an Indian religion, and was bestowed the achievement The British Raj.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled an Indian kingdom or empire while not being of Indian culture, and was bestowed the achievement Beyond the Indus.

[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled an Indian empire as a Muslim, and after converting all realm provinces within that de jure empire to Muslim was bestowed the achievement Great Indian Sultanate.

[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled an Indian kingdom or empire as a Christian, and after converting all realm provinces within that de jure realm to Christian was bestowed the achievement Saint Thomas' Dream.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] converted both Rome and Constantinople to an Indian faith, and was bestowed the achievement What Schism?
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] converted Mecca to an Indian faith, and was bestowed the achievement Red Sea Resort.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled over both the Empire of Eranshahr and the Indian Empire, and was bestowed the achievement Looking East and West.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] was simultaneously at war with the Aztecs and Mongols, and was bestowed the achievement Medieval Schlieffen.
[GetDateText]: [From.GetTitledName] divorced the Lombard princess [Root.GetTitledName] and was bestowed the achievement I'm Sorry, Desiderata.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] seduced 10 people by targeted seduction, and was bestowed the achievement Casanova.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] successfully slandered 20 people, and was bestowed the achievement Mudslinger.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] won 7 duels, and was bestowed the achievement Bring It On.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] was simultaneously friends with 6 close relatives, and was bestowed the achievement Family Bliss.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] was killed on the orders of [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHusbandWife] [This.GetTitledName], who was bestowed the achievement Until Death Do Us Part.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] controlled all the Silk Road ports in India as a European merchant republic, and was bestowed the achievement Who Needs Vasco da Gama?
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] owned 3 trade posts on the Silk Road that are Major Silk Road Cities, and was bestowed the achievement Pax Mongolica.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] allowed the mercenary captain [From.GetTitledName] to settle on [Root.GetHerHis] lands, and was bestowed the achievement Sword to Ploughshare.
Achievement gained!
[Root.GetTitledName] has sailed into port with a fleet laden with over 1000 gold, earning the achievement §YViking Raider§!!
A date to go down in history.
Why should I care?
[Root.GetTitledName] has been elected to succeed [FromFrom.GetTitledName], earning the achievement §YMr. Doge Elect§!!

[Root.GetTitledName] has been crowned reigning Empress, a feat achieved by her mother [Root.Mother.GetTitledName] and grandmother [Root.Mother.Mother.GetTitledName] before her, earning the achievement §YEmpressive§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has killed or arranged the death of three of her husbands, earning the achievement §YBlack Widow§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has engineered the election of [From.GetTitledName] who is widely regarded as immoral, earning the achievement §YBlack Bishop§!!

[Root.GetTitledName] has arranged the death of his vassal bishop [From.GetTitledName], who paid more attention to the wishes of the Pope than of his liege, earning the achievement §YTurbulent Priest§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has had [Root.GetHerHis] fifth child, earning the achievement §YFull House§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has had a child born inbred, earning the achievement §YKeeping it in the Family§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] married [From.GetTitledName], earning the achievement §YThe Marriage Game§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has ascended to the throne of the Empire of Britannia while being a [Root.Religion.GetName], earning the achievement §YBritish Raj§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has ascended to the throne of the Empire of India while being a [Root.Culture.GetName], earning the achievement §YBeyond the Indus§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has ascended to the throne of the Empire of Tamilakam while being a [Root.Culture.GetName], earning the achievement §YBeyond the Indus§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has ascended to the throne of the Deccan Empire while being a [Root.Culture.GetName], earning the achievement §YBeyond the Indus§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has ascended to the throne of the Bengal Empire while being a [Root.Culture.GetName], earning the achievement §YBeyond the Indus§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] rules the Empire of Rajastan as a Muslim, and all de jure vassals within its borders are also Muslim, earning the achievement §YGreat Indian Sultanate§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] rules the Empire of India as a Muslim, and all de jure vassals within its borders are also Muslim, earning the achievement §YGreat Indian Sultanate§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] rules a kingdom or empire in India as a Christian, and all de jure vassals within its borders are also Christian, earning the achievement §YSt. Thomas' Dream§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has converted Rome and Constantinople to [Root.Religion.GetName], earning the achievement §YWhat Schism?§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has converted Mecca to [Root.Religion.GetName], earning the achievement §YRed Sea Resort§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] rules both the Persian Empire and the Empire of Rajastan, earning the achievement §YLooking East and West§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] rules both the Persian Empire and the Empire of India, earning the achievement §YLooking East and West§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] is simultaneously at war with Mongols and Aztecs, earning the achievement §YMedieval Schlieffen§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has divorced the Lombard princess [From.GetTitledName], earning the achievement §YI'm Sorry, Desiderata§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has seduced [Root.GetHerHis] tenth paramour through targeted seduction, earning the achievement §YCasanova§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has successfully slandered 20 people, earning the achievement §YMudslinger§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] has won 7 duels, earning the achievement §YBring It On§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] is friends with 6 close relatives, earning the achievement §YFamily Bliss§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] had [Root.GetHerHis] [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetTitledName] killed, earning the achievement §YUntil Death Do Us Part§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] controls all Silk Road ports in India as a merchant republic in [Root.Capital.GetName], earning the achievement §YWho Needs Vasco da Gama?§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] owns 3 fully upgraded trade posts on the Silk Road, earning the achievement §YPax Mongolica§!!
[Root.GetTitledName] allowed the mercenary captain [FromFrom.GetTitledName] to settle in his lands, earning the achievement §YSword to Ploughshare§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] set [From.GetTitledName] up as an antipope, and was bestowed the achievement A Pope of My Own.
[Root.GetTitledName] has set up [From.GetTitledName] as an antipope, earning the achievement §YA Pope of My Own§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] played in a game in which there were 2 simultaneous antipopes, and was bestowed the achievement All Three Popes.
[Root.GetTitledName] is playing in a game with 2 simultaneous antipopes, earning the achievement §YA Pope of My Own§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] achieved [Root.GetHerHis] ambition to Become Exalted, and was bestowed the achievement Exalted Among Men.
[Root.GetTitledName] achieved [Root.GetHerHis] ambition to Become Exalted, earning the achievement §YExalted Among Men§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] became a crusader, and was bestowed the achievement Crusader.
[Root.GetTitledName] has become a crusader, earning the achievement §YCrusader§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] achieved [Root.GetHerHis] ambition to Become Paragon of Virtue, and was bestowed the achievement Paragon of Virtue.
[Root.GetTitledName] achieved [Root.GetHerHis] ambition to Become Paragon of Virtue, earning the achievement §YParagon of Virtue§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] held the titles to the kingdoms of England, Scotland, Wales and Ireland, and was bestowed the achievement United the Kingdoms.
[Root.GetTitledName] holds the titles to the kingdoms of England, Scotland, Wales and Ireland, earning the achievement §YUnited the Kingdoms§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] was a Catholic ruler of a realm that bordered Monophysite Abyssinia, and was bestowed the achievement Prester John.
[Root.GetTitledName] is a Catholic ruler of a realm that bordered Monophysite Abyssinia, earning the achievement §YPrester John§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled the Kingdom of Russia as a Russian, and was bestowed the achievement Russkaya Pravda.
[Root.GetTitledName] rules the Kingdom of Russia as a Russian, earning the achievement §YRusskaya Pravda§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled a realm controlling Rome, Jerusalem, Mecca and Medina, and was bestowed the achievement Protector of the Holy Places.
[Root.GetTitledName] rules a realm controlling Rome, Jerusalem, Mecca and Medina, earning the achievement §YProtector of the Holy Places§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] was an Orthodox ruler of a realm controlling Rome, Jerusalem, Constantinople, Alexandria and Antioch, and was bestowed the achievement Pentarch.
[Root.GetTitledName] is an Orthodox ruler of a realm controlling Rome, Jerusalem, Constantinople, Alexandria and Antioch, earning the achievement §YPentarch§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] restored the Roman Empire, and was bestowed the achievement Legacy of Rome.
[Root.GetTitledName] has restored the Roman Empire, earning the achievement §YLegacy of Rome§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] conquered England, and was bestowed the achievement On English Back a Norman Yoke.
[Root.GetTitledName] has conquered England, earning the achievement §YOn English Back a Norman Yoke§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] conquered England, and was bestowed the achievement Hard Ruler.
[Root.GetTitledName] has conquered England, earning the achievement §YHard Ruler§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] rose from the rank of count to duke, and was bestowed the achievement Always Bet On Duke.
[Root.GetTitledName] has risen from the rank of count to duke, earning the achievement §YAlways Bet On Duke§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] rose from the rank of count to king, and was bestowed the achievement It's Good to be the King.
[Root.GetTitledName] has risen from the rank of count to king, earning the achievement §YIt's Good to be the King§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] rose from the rank of count to emperor, and was bestowed the achievement It's Better to be the Emperor.
[Root.GetTitledName] has risen from the rank of count to emperor, earning the achievement §YIt's Better to be the Emperor§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] held the Kingdom of Jerusalem, and was bestowed the achievement Crusader King.
[Root.GetTitledName] holds the Kingdom of Jerusalem, earning the achievement §YCrusader King§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] conquered England, and was bestowed the achievement The Outside Bet.
[Root.GetTitledName] has conquered England, earning the achievement §YThe Outside Bet§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] reclaimed the ancient Roman Imperial borders, and was bestowed the achievement S.P.Q.R.
[Root.GetTitledName] has reclaimed the ancient Roman Imperial borders, earning the achievement §YS.P.Q.R.§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] became the prophesied Saoshyant, and was bestowed the achievement The One Who Brings Benefit.
[Root.GetTitledName] has become the prophesied Saoshyant, earning the achievement §YThe One Who Brings Benefit§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] created the Kingdom of Israel, and was bestowed the achievement Kingdom of David.
[Root.GetTitledName] has created the Kingdom of Israel, earning the achievement §YKingdom of David§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] reformed a pagsn religion, and was bestowed the achievement New Ways for Old Gods.
[Root.GetTitledName] has reformed a pagsn religion, earning the achievement §YNew Ways for Old Gods§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] went on a hajj, and was bestowed the achievement To Mecca!
[Root.GetTitledName] has gone on a hajj, earning the achievement §YTo Mecca§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] went on a pilgrimage, and was bestowed the achievement Pilgrim.
[Root.GetTitledName] has gone on a pilgrimage, earning the achievement §YPilgrim§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] amassed more than 20,000 in wealth, and was bestowed the achievement Merchant Prince.
[Root.GetTitledName] has amassed more than 20,000 in wealth, earning the achievement §YMerchant Prince§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] amassed more than 10,000 in piety, and was bestowed the achievement Saint.
[Root.GetTitledName] has amassed more than 10,000 in piety, earning the achievement §YSaint§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] amassed more than 15,000 in prestige, and was bestowed the achievement Dream Home.
[Root.GetTitledName] has amassed more than 15,000 in prestige, earning the achievement §YCelebrity§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] fully upgraded [Root.GetHerHis] family palace, and was bestowed the achievement Dream Home.
[Root.GetTitledName] has fully upgraded [Root.GetHerHis] family palace, earning the achievement §YDream Home§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName]'s republic maintained 80 trade posts, and [Root.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement Trade Empire.
[Root.GetTitledName]'s republic maintains 80 trade posts, earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YTrade Empire§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] conquered continental western Europe, and was bestowed the achievement Khan of Khans.
[Root.GetTitledName] has conquered continental western Europe, earning the achievement §YKhan of Khans§!!
[GetDateText]: The Aztecs were thrown back into the sea, and the achievement And Stay Out! was bestowed upon [Root.GetTitledName]
The Aztecs have been thrown back into the see, earning [Root.GetTitledName] the achievement §YAnd Stay Out§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] achieved a score of 100,000, and was bestowed the achievement Divine Blood.
[Root.GetTitledName] has achieved a score of 100,000, earning the achievement §YDivine Blood§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] achieved a score of 50,000, and was bestowed the achievement Dragon Blood.
[Root.GetTitledName] has achieved a score of 50,000, earning the achievement §YDragon Blood§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] achieved a score of 10,000, and was bestowed the achievement Royal Blood.
[Root.GetTitledName] has achieved a score of 10,000, earning the achievement §YRoyal Blood§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] became an independent Emperor, and was bestowed the achievement The Caliphate Strikes Back.
[Root.GetTitledName] has become an indpendent Emperor, earning the achievement §YThe Caliphate Strikes Back§!!
Congratulations!
Boo! Hiss! I wanted that achievement, you bum!

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Congratulations on your recent achievement.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledFirstName] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
I could not have done it on my own.

To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You achievement whore! That achievement is rightfully mine!

Disgusted,[From.GetTitledFirstName] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
He's just jealous.
Send a letter of congratulations.
Send a letter of complaint.
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] crushed a decadence revolt, and was bestowed the achievement Decadent Warrior.
[Root.GetTitledName] has crushed a decadence revolt, earning the achievement §YDecadent Warrior§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] had 7 dwarf courtiers, and was bestowed the achievement Dwarf Fortress.
[Root.GetTitledName] has 7 dwarf courtiers, earning the achievement §YDwarf Fortress§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] sacrificed the head of another religion, and was bestowed the achievement Holy Smoke.
[Root.GetTitledName] has sacrificed the head of another religion, earning the achievement §YHoly Smoke§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] became Samrat Chakravartin, and was bestowed the achievement My very own subcontinent.
[Root.GetTitledName] has become Samrat Chakravartin, earning the achievement §YMy very own subcontinent§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] sacrificed a King or Emperor tier character, and was bestowed the achievement Kali Maaa.
[Root.GetTitledName] has sacrificed a King or Emperor tier character, earning the achievement §YKali Maaa§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] killed a tiger with [Root.GetHerHis] own hands, and was bestowed the achievement I can see its stripes.
[Root.GetTitledName] has killed a tiger with [Root.GetHerHis] own hands, earning the achievement §YI can see its stripes§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] founded the Holy Roman Empire, and was bestowed the achievement Holy and Roman.
[Root.GetTitledName] has founded the Holy Roman Empire, earning the achievement §YHoly and Roman§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] as a [Root.Religion.GetName], and was bestowed the achievement Empire of the Sun.
[Root.GetTitledName] rules the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] as a [Root.Religion.GetName], earning the achievement §YEmpire of the Sun§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] conquered Saxony as a [Root.Culture.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetName], and was bestowed the achievement Empire of the Sun.
[Root.GetTitledName] has conquered Saxony as a [Root.Culture.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetName], earning the achievement §YEmpire of the Sun§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled both England and Saxony as a [Root.Culture.GetName], and was bestowed the achievement Saxons everywhere, unite!
[Root.GetTitledName] rules both England and Saxony as a [Root.Culture.GetName], earning the achievement §YSaxons everywhere, unite!§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled the Atlantic coast from Léon to Jylland as King of Frisia, and was bestowed the achievement The Frisian coast is long.
[Root.GetTitledName] rules the Atlantic coast from Léon to Jylland as King of Frisia, earning the achievement §YThe Frisian coast is long§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] became Emperor of Francia, and was bestowed the achievement The Frisian coast is long.
[Root.GetTitledName] has become Emperor of Francia, earning the achievement §YThe Frisian coast is long§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] ruled from a [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] [Root.Capital.Religion.GetName] capital, and was bestowed the achievement Viking Ummah.
[Root.GetTitledName] rules from a [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] [Root.Capital.Religion.GetName] capital, earning the achievement §YViking Ummah§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] reformed [Root.GetHerHis] government from tribal to feudal, and was bestowed the achievement Not a Tribe.
[Root.GetTitledName] has reformed [Root.GetHerHis] government from tribal to feudal, earning the achievement §YNot a Tribe§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] reformed [Root.GetHerHis] government from tribal to a merchant republic, and was bestowed the achievement Not a Tribe.
[Root.GetTitledName] has reformed [Root.GetHerHis] government from tribal to a merchant republic, earning the achievement §YNot a Tribe§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] killed [Root.GetHerHis] prey in the Great Hunt, and was bestowed the achievement Great Hunter.
[Root.GetTitledName] has killed [Root.GetHerHis] prey in the Great Hunt, earning the achievement §YGreat Hunter§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] established a trade route, and was bestowed the achievement We're In Business.
[Root.GetTitledName] has established a trade route, earning the achievement §YWe're In Business§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] gained Legendary Wisdom, and was bestowed the achievement Wise Guy.
[Root.GetTitledName] has gained Legendary Wisdom, earning the achievement §YWise Guy§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] became a hedonist through carousing, and was bestowed the achievement Let's Play.
[Root.GetTitledName] has become a hedonist through carousing, earning the achievement §YLet's Play§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] built an observatory, and was bestowed the achievement Stargazer.
[Root.GetTitledName] has built an observatory, earning the achievement §YStargazer§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] became a Theologian, and was bestowed the achievement By the Gods.
[Root.GetTitledName] has become a Theologian, earning the achievement §YBy the Gods§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] conquered all the steppes, and was bestowed the achievement Steppe by steppe.
[Root.GetTitledName] has conquered all the steppes, earning the achievement §YSteppe by steppe§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] conquered the eastern steppes, and was bestowed the achievement "Never start a land war in Asia".
[Root.GetTitledName] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has conquered the eastern steppes, earning the achievement §Y"Never start a land war in Asia"§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] became the [Root.Culture.GetName] King of Mongolia, and was bestowed the achievement Norse-East.
[Root.GetTitledName] has become the [Root.Culture.GetName] King of Mongolia, earning the achievement §YNorse-East§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] defeated [Root.GetHerHis] sibling in war using a rival CB, and was bestowed the achievement Let's go out into the field.
[Root.GetTitledName] has defeated [Root.GetHerHis] sibling in war using a rival CB, earning the achievement §YLet's go out into the field§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] conquered Constantinople, and was bestowed the achievement Nobody's business but the Turks'.
[Root.GetTitledName] has conquered Constantinople, earning the achievement §YNobody's business but the Turks'§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName]'s horde's population exceeded 150,000, and [Root.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement One arrow alone can be easily broken but many arrows are indestructible.
[Root.GetTitledName]'s horde's population exceeded 150,000, earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YOne arrow alone can be easily broken but many arrows are indestructible§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] received tribute from a king or emperor in the British Isles, and [Root.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement Go west young mongol.
[Root.GetTitledName] receives tribute from a king or emperor in the British Isles, earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YGo west young mongol§!!
[GetDateText]: [Root.GetTitledName] received tribute from a king or emperor in the British Isles, and [Root.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement Go west young mongol.
[Root.GetTitledName] receives tribute from a king or emperor in the British Isles, earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YGo west young mongol§!!
[GetDateText]: [This.GetTitledName] had [This.GetHerHis] twelfth child, and [This.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement Cheaper By The Dozen.
[Root.GetTitledName] had [Root.GetHerHis] twelfth child, earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YCheaper By The Dozen§!!
[GetDateText]: [This.GetTitledName] has taken control of all five of the [This.Religion.GetName] holy sites, and [This.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement Holier Than Thou.
[Root.GetTitledName] has taken control of all five of the [Root.Religion.GetName] holy sites, earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YHolier Than Thou§!!
[GetDateText]: [This.GetTitledName] had all members of [This.GetHerHis] council be Loyalists, and [This.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement The Yes Men.
[Root.GetTitledName] had all members of [Root.GetHerHis] council be Loyalists, earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YThe Yes Men§!!
[GetDateText]: [This.GetTitledName] had someone owe [This.GetHerHim] a favor, and [This.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement You Owe Me.
[Root.GetTitledName] had someone owe [Root.GetHerHim] a favor, earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YYou Owe Me§!!

[GetDateText]: [This.GetTitledName] sat on the council [This.Liege.GetBestName] with all other councilors and [This.Liege.GetBestName] owing [This.GetHerHim] a favor, and [This.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement Shadow Prince.

[Root.GetTitledName] sat on the council of [Root.Liege.GetBestName] with all other councilors and [Root.Liege.GetBestName] owing [Root.GetHerHim] favors, earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YShadow Prince§!!
[GetDateText]: [This.GetTitledName] used mercenaries to win a war, and [This.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement Pay to Win.
[Root.GetTitledName] used mercenaries to win a war, earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YPay to Win§!!
[GetDateText]: [This.GetTitledName] has created a mercenary band that will remit money to [This.GetHerHim], and [This.GetSheHe] was bestowed the achievement Paid to Win.
[Root.GetTitledName] created a mercenary band that will remit money to [Root.GetHerHim], earning [Root.GetHerHim] the achievement §YPaid to Win§!!
